original_title: The Christmas of the Ugly Duckling
overview: Based on the successful series of Neptuno Films. Winter has arrived at last on the farm where the Ugly Duckling lives, and everybody is getting ready to celebrate Christmas. The Ugly Duckling and his friend Nico the Piglet set out on a fantastic journey, accompanied by a snowman, who needs their help to find the Magic Mountain: that´s where all good snowman meet up, to become stars twinkling in the sky. But this is only one of the enchanting stories that make up the Ugly Duckling´s Christmas Adventure.
title: The Christmas of the Ugly Duckling
